p: A total of 1,980 papers were found in the databases searched as primary sources of information. After the duplicates were removed ( n = 155), 1,825 papers were selected for the first screening of titles and abstracts. Of these, 1,787 were excluded by the following criteria: dealing with diseases other than ASF ( n = 729), type of publication (studies on ASF pathogenicity and diagnosis, experimental infections in animals and ticks with ASFV, communications on clinical findings, n = 1,058).
